title: Kirby Model 508 Owners Manual from 1948
content:
1. Information such as the country: USA  
2. Age of the sample 1948  
3. A pdf scan of the user manual can be found at [http://www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140514/http:/www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/ "http://www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/") and look for model 508 at the bottom of the page.  
4. I am trying to reproduce the old manual and would like to know the fonts used so I can re-create the manual to be as close to the original one as possible.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/508_Font_Test_6385.jpg)

Font: 

 Bookman Oldstyle 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140514/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: mbpb45
